GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: 1 Handset, 1 Battery, 1 Charger, 1 Handfree, 1 User Mannual, 1 Warranty Card

Warranty.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the product is limited to manufacturing defects only. Physicall damage, water damage, Burned etc are not covered.
Warranty.Not Covered in Warranty: Accessories such as battery, charger & handfree has only six months warranty
Warranty.Warranty Service Type: Off-site Warranty. Customer needs to go nearby service center.
Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warrenty, Customer has to take his mobile to the nearest service center by himself.
